trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged"> </xref> händelser i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>händelsen inträffar när värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A>egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>styra ändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>händelsen inträffar när värdet för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A>egenskapsändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsehanteraren delegater information om händelsehanteraren delegater finns [NIB: händelser och delegater](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
